meanings.definition: The act of making something ethereal or spiritual.
meanings.sent1: The etherealization of the music filled the room with a sense of peace.
meanings.sent2: Her etherealization of the painting gave it a mystical quality.
meanings.sent3: The etherealization of the cake made it taste like a cloud.
meanings.sent4: His etherealization of the story transformed it into a beautiful legend.
meanings.sent5: The etherealization of the forest in the painting was truly enchanting.

meanings.definition: The process of becoming ethereal or immaterial.
meanings.sent1: The etherealization of the mist made it seem like a ghostly presence.
meanings.sent2: Over time, the etherealization of the dream faded into a distant memory.
meanings.sent3: The etherealization of the ice cream turned it into a dreamy treat.
meanings.sent4: As the sun set, the etherealization of the sky painted it in pastel hues.
meanings.sent5: The etherealization of her voice in the song was hauntingly beautiful.
